name: Expanding Force
description: You attack with psychic power. Choose a target in range. That target makes a WIS save against your Move DC, taking 1d6 + MOVE psychic damage on failure or half damage on success. If you are under the effects of Psychic Terrain, then this move deals an additional 1d6 psychic damage, and you may choose any number of targets subject to the same terrain effect to make the save.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 3d6 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
